name: The 107% Rule
description:
A minimal F1 Racing Management game.

You control the strategy and coordinate the pitstops of two drivers that race 18 opponents.

Cool things:
-Changing weather
-All drivers have randomized Finnish names

This game was made in a month and probably won't have future updates.

SFX Used:

Racing Ambience RTB45

https://freesound.org/people/RTB45/sounds/161971/?...

Rain Ambience - STEPH64

https://freesound.org/people/steph64/sounds/205830...
